p: The classical serological assays listed above are not able to detect and distinguish specific antibodies directed against the stalk region. Though, since February 2017, the new European Medicines Agency (EMA) guidelines have withdrawn the concept of the traditional correlates of protection for influenza, the HI titer is still considered the gold standard, and the correlates of protection based on this are still used in many countries, such as the U.S., Japan and Australia [ 44, 45].
